name: Seven Seas Technology
description: Seven Seas Technology (SSTech) has chosen a collaborative, multi-cloud strategy that puts customers first by partnering with most of the major technology vendors. We help our customers innovate their processes, create valuable connections and rapport with their business and increase their productivity. We transform your business by offering ICT solutions and services in Enterprise Systems, Cloud Offerings, Data Networking & Information Security, Unified Communication, Microsoft Licensing & Solutions, Value Added Services, BCP & DR, Data Centers, Cabling, Audio Visual, Access Control, CCTV and Outsourcing Services. With over 38 years of experience and 300+ ICT trained and certified professionals, Seven Seas Technology has a wealth of expertise to deliver solutions designed to meet your today’s business needs and allow for future growth. We work with you in mind to offer integrated, cost-effective design and solutions, oversee smooth overall project implementation and provide regular maintenance and enhancements to meet ongoing and future needs. Our customers range from Large and Medium Enterprises across all vertical industries such as Aviation, Conglomerates, Government, Oil & Gas, Banking & Finance, Hospitality, Healthcare, Education and Retail. Seven Seas Technology (SSTech) is your ideal partner for all your ICT needs. As of 1st July, Seven Seas Technology is a Noventiq company. Noventiq is the leading digital transformation and cybersecurity solutions and services provider for emerging markets. Noventiq, which currently has over 75,000 customers in almost 60 countries, is headquartered in London, and in May 2023, Noventiq announced its intent to list on Nasdaq through a proposed business combination with Corner Growth Acquisition Corp.
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Seven Seas Technology is a leading System Integrator and an ICT Solution Provider in UAE.
ShortDescription: Seven Seas Technology (SSTech) has chosen a collaborative, multi-cloud strategy that puts customers first by partnering with most of the major technology vendors. We help our customers innovate their processes, create valuable connections and rapport with their business and increase their productivity.

Highlights.name: A Wide Range of IT Solutions
Highlights.description: They offer solutions in cloud computing, data networking, and information security. The company also offers managed services to businesses.

Highlights.name: Experienced Team with Over 40 Years of Expertise
Highlights.description: Seven Seas Technology has been in business for over 40 years and has a team of over 300 ICT trained and certified professionals.

enhanced_description: Seven Seas Technology (SSTech) is a leading System Integrator and ICT Solution Provider based in the UAE, with over 38 years of experience. They leverage a collaborative, multi-cloud strategy by partnering with major technology vendors to deliver comprehensive ICT solutions and services. These offerings aim to help customers innovate processes, foster valuable business connections, and enhance productivity. SSTech's extensive portfolio includes Enterprise Systems, Cloud Offerings, Data Networking & Information Security, Unified Communication, Microsoft Licensing & Solutions, Value Added Services, Business Continuity Planning (BCP) & Disaster Recovery (DR), Data Centers, Cabling, Audio Visual, Access Control, CCTV, and Outsourcing Services. With a team of over 300 ICT trained and certified professionals, SSTech designs and implements integrated, cost-effective solutions for today's needs while enabling future growth, including ongoing maintenance and enhancements. They cater to Large and Medium Enterprises across diverse sectors such as Aviation, Conglomerates, Government, Oil & Gas, Banking & Finance, Hospitality, Healthcare, Education, and Retail. As of July 1st, Seven Seas Technology is a Noventiq company, further expanding its capabilities in digital transformation and cybersecurity solutions for emerging markets.
competitive_advantages: Partnerships with most major technology vendors
Team of 300+ ICT trained and certified professionals
Wide range of IT solutions and services
Focus on integrated, cost-effective design and solutions
Part of Noventiq, expanding global reach and expertise in digital transformation and cybersecurity
integration_capabilities: Integration with major technology vendors' platforms
System Integration across various ICT solutions
roi_benefits: Creation of valuable connections and rapport within the business
Solutions designed to meet current business needs and allow for future growth
Ongoing support through maintenance and enhancements
Improvement of employee happiness and engagement
scalability_features: Designed to allow for future growth
